publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-508.2 Mr John Swinney: Knowledge Economy—As an amendment to motion (S1M-508) in the name of Nicol Stephen, insert at end "and calls upon the Scottish Executive to put in place a coherent strategy to ensure that areas of common interest between separate taskforces and Executive departments are properly co-ordinated and focused, to introduce a framework to measure effectively the performance of the Scottish economy in adapting to the challenges of the Knowledge Economy and to ensure that the Knowledge Economy is not placed at any competitive disadvantage." Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Fergus Ewing*
